bill.title: Voter Registration; Electronic Registration; Appropriation
bill.description: Updates voter registration laws, including authorizing the acceptance of electronic applications to register to vote; applies to all primary, special, nonpartisan, and general elections, beginning with the primary election of 2016. Makes an appropriation. Effective July 1, 2012. (HB1755 CD1)
